Relocates the character to the entrance Room.

Returns the Direction constant that results after rotating clockwise from this Direction constant.

room - Variable in class Labyrinth
The Room the character is currently located in.

Key-value pairs that map each Direction constant to the appropriate Room instance.
Room - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents an individual room of the map.
Room(int, int, int[][][]) - Constructor for class Room
Constructs a Room instance at the (row,col) position of the given map, setting the right values of the door and isExit fields.
rotate(IntUnaryOperator) - Method in enum class Direction
Returns the Direction constant with the ordinal number that results after applying the offset function to the ordinal number of this Direction constant.
